snippet.title: ARTIUS: Pure Imagination - Trailer
snippet.description:
🔗WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3599920/ARTIUS_Pure_Imagination/

An early look at ARTIUS in its pre-alpha stage. The footage represents a work in progress and does not reflect the final version of the game.

ARTIUS: Pure Imagination is a momentum-based 2D action platformer where players embody four unique artists fighting to preserve creativity in a world on the verge of artistic extinction. Inspired by the high-speed flow of Sonic the Hedgehog, and the expressive chaos of Pizza Tower and ANTONBLAST, ARTIUS brings a fresh take on movement-driven action.

Development is ongoing, and more updates will follow as we move toward release.

🔗 https://artius.pvicvg.com/

#gamedev #indiegames #platformer #pixelart #sonicthehedgehog #pizzatower
